prompt:
Create a webtoon/manga panel in webtoon art style.

## ATMOSPHERE & MOOD
LIGHTING: Bright natural daylight - warm golden tones, soft shadows, clear visibility

## VISUAL CONTINUITY (CRITICAL)
Match the reference image for:
- Art style, line weight, coloring technique
- Character appearance (face, hair, clothes)
- Color palette and lighting direction
- Background style and detail level

Create NEW composition showing:
- Fresh pose and body position for this action
- New camera angle as specified
MAINTAIN: The reflection from panel 1 is now the reality.

## COMPOSITION
- Shot: wide establishing shot showing full environment and characters
- Angle: low angle looking up, shows power or grandeur
- Location: Cartenon Temple (The Double Dungeon) (A massive, ancient stone chamber hidden inside a cave. Walls are lined with unlit torches that flare blue when the door shuts.) - Visual elements: Lighting: Eerie blue torchlight casting long shadows, Key Object: The Statue of God (massive stone figure with a creepy smile), Atmosphere: Claustrophobic, ancient, divine dread, Palette: Cold blues and stone greys

## ACTION & EMOTION
A massive stone statue, resembling a cruel god, fills the frame. It is swinging a sword down towards the viewer (Jin-woo). The scale is overwhelming.

## VISUAL EFFECTS (if appropriate)
- Motion lines for movement
- Speed lines for action
- Sparkles/glow for magical/emotional moments
- Dramatic lighting for tension

## TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS
- FULL BLEED composition (art to all edges, NO white borders)
- NO text, speech bubbles, or sound effects in image
- Clean professional linework
- Expressive faces with clear emotions
- Dynamic poses with weight and balance
- Rich background detail that supports the mood
